name: Data Defender
description:
Your computer is under attack from ransomware, and the only one who can defend it is you!

Fight of waves to defend your data and protect what you own. 

Controls

W, A, S, D = Movement

Left-Click = Fire

R = Reload

C = Crouch 

Esc = Quit/Leave Full Screen

F2 = A settings change to improve performance

F10 = Reloads the demo from the start

In this early version of the game there is a limit of five waves of opponents to defend your PC against. This project is in early access and the wave limit and gameplay will be expanded with time, along with input from players will be used to help guide the development of the project.
